sentence: The infographic illustrates the average number of cigarettes smoked yearly by residents of various cities around the world.
sentence_cn: 该信息图显示了世界各地各个城市居民每年吸烟的平均数量。

sentence: It compares these numbers to the heights of well-known structures, providing a visual sense of scale.
sentence_cn: 它将这些数字与著名建筑物的高度进行比较，提供视觉上的规模感。

sentence: Here's a detailed breakdown:
sentence_cn: 以下是详细分析：

sentence: ### Cigarettes Smoked Annually by Average City Resident:
sentence_cn: ### 城市居民平均每年吸烟量：

sentence: - Japan: 3,023 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 日本：3,023 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: MetLife Building, New York (819 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：纽约大都会人寿大厦（819 英尺）

sentence: - USA: 2,255 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 美国：2,255 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Space Needle, Seattle (610 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：西雅图太空针塔（610 英尺）

sentence: - France: 2,058 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 法国：2,058 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: 30 St Mary Axe, London (The Gherkin) (587 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：伦敦圣玛丽斧街 30 号（小黄瓜）（587 英尺）

sentence: - China: 1,791 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 中国：1,791支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Great Pyramid of Giza, Cairo (481 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：开罗吉萨大金字塔（481 英尺）

sentence: - Russia: 1,702 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 俄罗斯：1,702 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: London Eye, London (443 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：伦敦眼，伦敦（443 英尺）

sentence: - Brazil: 858 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 巴西：858 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Notre Dame Cathedral, Paris (226 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：巴黎圣母院（226 英尺）

sentence: - Mexico: 750 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 墨西哥：750 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Lincoln Memorial, Washington D.C. (190 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：华盛顿特区林肯纪念堂（190 英尺）

sentence: - Pakistan: 564 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 巴基斯坦：564支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Statue of Liberty, New York (151 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：纽约自由女神像（151 英尺）

sentence: - Bangladesh: 245 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 孟加拉国：245 支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Great Sphinx of Giza, Cairo (66 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：开罗吉萨大狮身人面像（66 英尺）

sentence: - India: 129 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 印度：129支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Great Wall of China (30 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：中国长城（30 英尺）

sentence: - Ethiopia: 82 cigarettes
sentence_cn: - 埃塞俄比亚：82支香烟

sentence: - Compared to: Michelangelo's David, Florence (23.5 ft)
sentence_cn: - 相比：佛罗伦萨米开朗基罗的大卫像（23.5 英尺）

sentence: ### Global Smoking:
sentence_cn: ### 全球吸烟：

sentence: - World Population: Smokes 15 billion cigarettes daily.
sentence_cn: - 世界人口：每天吸 150 亿支香烟。

sentence: - Laid end-to-end, these cigarettes would stretch 769,412 miles, equivalent to 3.2 trips to the moon.
sentence_cn: - 如果将这些香烟首尾相连，长度可达 769,412 英里，相当于 3.2 次月球之旅。

sentence: The visual effectively combines statistical data with iconic architecture to give a tangible understanding of cigarette consumption across different nations.
sentence_cn: 该视觉效果有效地将统计数据与标志性建筑结合起来，让人们切实了解不同国家的香烟消费情况。
